stable.body:
This update requires at least Android 6.0.
For older versions, [LAC Tool Legacy](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool-legacy) is now available.

# Major changes
- Rewritten in Jetpack Compose & Kotlin
- Faster file operations and optimizations for latest Android versions
- Material You theming
- Bottom navigation bar
- Wide screen & RTL layout support

# Map management
- Manage downloadable materials
- Filter map objects by name, optionally remove matches
- Merge multiple maps

# Changes since v3.0.0-alpha05
- Warning for September 2023 Files app updates
- Accessibility improvements
- Wide screen support
- RTL layout fixes
- Fixes for overlapping navigation bar & device notch

View this release on [GitHub](https://github.com/aliernfrog/lac-tool/releases/tag/v3.0.0)
